AccountModal.TermsAndConditionsFirstParagraph: If you wish to activate all features provided by the Instant Payments System (sarie), and the rest of the related services, such as sending funds via aliases (such as: the mobile number), we hope that you agree to share some of your data with SARIE system for the instant payments owned by the Saudi Central Bank (IBAN number - No. Mobile phone - e-mail - national ID number).
AccountModal.TermsAndConditionsSecondParagraph: At any time in the future, you may disable sharing of this data via all banking channels such as mobile banking or internet banking.
AccountModal.PasscodeUpdateLimitMessage: Your request to update your passcode has reached the maximum limit of 3 changes today. Please wait for 24 hours before attempting any further updates.

InfoModal.title: Why I can’t see my old requested statements?
InfoModal.description:
Your custom date requested statements will only appear for 30 days from its issue date, to preview any previous statement you will need to request it again. 

Your failed requests will only appear for one day.

You can only have three pending requests,
please wait for one of the requests to be done.

InstructionsScreen.subTextOne: What are the hopes and dreams you want to realise? Think big. Think small. Then let’s get to work together to make them happen.
InstructionsScreen.subTextTwo: Use ‘Your Goals’ to make a record of what you want achieve and when. We’ll make it as easy as possible for you meet and surpass your targets.
InstructionsScreen.subTextThree: That ‘Goal completed’ feeling is unbeatable! And we’ll be there to play back your achievement, and encourage you to embrace what’s next.

SetPin.title: Set PIN

paragraph.checkHighlighted: Check the correct delivery address is highlighted:

CardOrderedScreen.title: Your new card’s coming soon
CardOrderedScreen.paragraph:
It’ll be with you in a few days.

But why wait? You can use your new card details straight away to buy online or pay with your phone using {{device}}.

onlinePayment.label: Online payments
onlinePayment.helperText: Allow online payments with this card.

internationalPayment.label: International payments
internationalPayment.helperText: Allow payments outside Saudi Arabia with your card.

swipePayments.label: Swipe payments
swipePayments.helperText: Enable payments using your card’s magnetic stripe.

contactlessPayments.label: Contactless payments
contactlessPayments.helperText: Enable contactless payments with your card.

atmWithdrawals.label: ATM withdrawals
atmWithdrawals.helperText: Enable ATM withdrawals with your card.

onTheWay.title: Your card is on the way
onTheWay.paragraph: These settings will be available once you have received and activated your physical card.

cancelCardAlert.cancelCardDescription: Are you sure you want to cancel your card? This action cannot be undone.

lockCardView.cardLockedDetail: It cannot be used for purchases of any kind. Unlock to use again.

CardDetailsScreen.errorCopyClipboard: Couldn’t copy card number - try again.

lockConfirmationModal.title: Lock the card ?
lockConfirmationModal.message: Your transactions will be declined once your debit card is locked. You can unlock it anytime.

SectionOneInfo.label: Keep your card details safe
SectionOneInfo.helperText: Online retailers can’t see your real card details – perfect for sellers you don’t know.

SectionTwoInfo.label: Protect yourself from fraud
SectionTwoInfo.helperText: Once you’ve paid, your card details are useless to fraudsters.

SectionOneInfo.label: Online only
SectionOneInfo.helperText: One-time cards are for online purchases up to your regular card limit - not regular payments or subscriptions.

SectionTwoInfo.label: 30-day limit
SectionTwoInfo.helperText: Your old one-time cards stop working after 30 days.

SectionThreeInfo.label: Spend from your main account
SectionThreeInfo.helperText: One-time cards are linked to your main Croatia account.

SectionFourInfo.label: Hassle-free refunds
SectionFourInfo.helperText: Need a refund? You’ll still get it, even if you’ve used the card already.

SectionFiveInfo.label: Croatia Plus only
SectionFiveInfo.helperText: One-time cards are exclusive to Croatia Plus.

CardCreation.successMessage: Use these card details to make your purchase.

SingleUseCardsInfo.title: How do one-time cards work?
SingleUseCardsInfo.text:
They’re virtual debit cards that you can only use once, so they’re great for protecting yourself when you buy online.

When you generate a one-time card, you get a single-use card number, expiry and CVV. They’ll only work for one purchase and mean the merchant can’t see your real card details - so they’re a safer way to spend.

SelectReportReason.description: For lost, stolen, or damaged cards, we'll cancel it and send a new one. To prevent spending temporarily, just lock the card.
SelectReportReason.cardStolenDescription: Immediately cancel the card and arrange for a new one to prevent unauthorized access to your funds
SelectReportReason.cardDamagedDescription: For damaged card, it's important to maintain its functionality. Replace the card, ensuring seamless transactions.
SelectReportReason.cardLostDescription: Lost cards can be locked, and later unlocked. Canceled cards cannot be reactivated.
SelectReportReason.buttonTitle: Cancel my card and order another

ConfirmDeliveryAddress.description: Confirm where you’d like your new card to be delivered.
ConfirmDeliveryAddress.alertTitle: Are you sure you want to cancel the card?
ConfirmDeliveryAddress.alertMessage: We’ll cancel your card straight away and you won’t be able to use it. While you wait for your physical card, you’ll be able to use your new card online or on your phone immediately.

ReportCardSuccessScreen.title: We’ve cancelled your card
ReportCardSuccessScreen.description:
It’ll be with you in the next few days.

But why wait? You can use your new card details straight away to buy online or pay with your phone using {{device}}.

content.android: You can use your new card details straight away to buy online or add your card to mada Pay.

EnterCardCVVScreen.title: Enter new CVV
EnterCardCVVScreen.content: Enter the CVV code on the back of your new physical card. This tells us it’s arrived with you safely and hasn’t reached the wrong hands.
EnterCardCVVScreen.cvvNote: You’ll find the CVV on the back of your physical card.

AddMoneyInfo.note: The name you use for your transfer must exactly match your name here.
AddMoneyInfo.processingTimeInfo: Bank transfers will normally reach your Croatia account the same day or the next business day.

OneTimePasswordModal.notification: That OTP wasn't right. You have {{attempts}} attempts left.

sections.sectionOneContent: If you wish to activate this feature provided by the Instant Payments System (SARIE) and the rest of the related services, such as sending funds via alias like (mobile number), we inform you that by confirming this feature you are agreeing to share some of your data with SARIE system for the instant payments owned by the Saudi Central Bank (IBAN number, Mobile number, email address, National/Iqama ID number). At any time in the future, you may disable sharing this data via all banking channels such as mobile banking or internet banking.

TransferLimitsModal.title: What are my transfer limits?
TransferLimitsModal.standardTransferExplanation: Send up to 20,000 SAR to added or saved beneficiaries. If you need to send more than this, the transfer will be processed through normal local bank transfer method without any change.
TransferLimitsModal.quickTransferExplanation: Send a one time transfer up to 2,500 SAR. Transfers of this type can be done via Email, ID number, Mobile Number or IBAN without saving the beneficiary. You have the option to configure your daily limit within the maximum range.
TransferLimitsModal.nonWorkingDaysExplanation: If you make a standard transfer on a non-working day, the transfer will be processed on the following working day.
